body.raw:
{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "conf t
  community-set {{rp_community_set}}
  45:*,
  34:3,
  *:*,
  *:4545,
  no-export,
  no-advertise,
  [54..55]:[1..7],
  internet
end-set
!
commit
end
     "
  }
}

{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "conf t
  as-path-set {{rp_as_path}}
  neighbor-is '1.1',
  passes-through '54',
  originates-from '3243',
  length eq 444,
  unique-length eq 44,
  ios-regex '*'
end-set
!
commit
end
     "
  }
}

{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "conf t
  route-policy {{rp_policy}}
  if destination in {{rp_prefix_set}} then
    drop
  elseif community matches-any {{rp_community_set}} then
    set med 1
    prepend as-path 123 3
    done
  elseif destination in {{rp_prefix_set}} and as-path in {{rp_as_path}} then
    set med 2
    done
  else
    set med 3
    done
  endif
end-policy
!
commit
end
     "
  }
}

{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "conf t
     no route-policy {{rp_policy}}
     commit
route-policy {{rp_policy}}
  if destination in pset_name then
    drop
  elseif community matches-any cset_name then
    set med 1
    prepend as-path 123 3
    done
  elseif destination in pset_name and as-path in aset_name then
    set med 2
    done
  else
    set med 3
    done
  endif
end-policy
commit
end
    "
  }
}



!
route-policy route_policy_4
  if destination in pset_name then
    drop
  endif
  if destination in pset_name2 then
    drop
  endif
end-policy
!
route-policy route_policy_5
end-policy
!
route-policy route_policy_31
  if tag eq 44 then
    if tag eq 55 then
      done
    endif
    drop
  endif
end-policy
!
route-policy route_policy_TMP
  if destination in pset_name then
    drop
  endif
  set label 44
  drop
end-policy
!
route-policy route_policy_TMP2
  set tag 4334
  set tag 4334
  # comment
  if destination in pset_name then
    drop
  endif
  apply allowAll
  done
end-policy
!
route-policy big1
  if destination in RFC1918-DSUA-out_deny then
    drop
  elseif community matches-any PEER-NOT-ADVERTISE then
    drop
  elseif community matches-any PEER-1PREPEND then
    set med 100
    prepend as-path 17676
  elseif community matches-any PEER-2PREPEND then
    set med 100
    prepend as-path 17676 2
  elseif community matches-any PEER-3PREPEND then
    set med 100
    prepend as-path 17676 3
  elseif community matches-any Asia-PEER-NOT-ADVERTISE then
    drop
  elseif community matches-any Asia-PEER-1PREPEND then
    set med 100
    prepend as-path 17676
  elseif community matches-any Asia-PEER-2PREPEND then
    set med 100
    prepend as-path 17676 2
  elseif community matches-any Asia-PEER-3PREPEND then
    set med 100
    prepend as-path 17676 3
  elseif destination in DENY_YBB_CIDR_long then
    drop
  elseif destination in YBB_CIDR and as-path in 2 then
    set med 100
  elseif destination in DENY_IPR_CIDR_long then
    drop
  elseif destination in IPR_CIDR and as-path in 2 then
    set med 100
  elseif community matches-any TRANSIT_MATCH or community matches-any PI_MATCH or community matches-any MultiAS-ODN-CIDR or community matches-any MultiAS-PI-ODN or community matches-any ODN-TRAN then
    set med 100
  endif
end-policy
!
route-policy simple_or
  if destination in pset_name and community matches-any ab or community matches-any c or as-path in aset_name and destination in bset_name then
    apply route_policy_TMP2
    set community (44:4, 1:1, no-export) additive
    set next-hop dead:beef::1
    done
  endif
end-policy

exec: // if tag blabla - is not suported, so add assertions once it is supported (see FI-197)
//set label is not supported yet, add assetions once it is  (FI-198)
//set tag is not suported yet, add assertions once it is (FI-199)

route-policy {{rp_policy}}

end-policy
commit
end"
  }
}
